name: Demand Profile Report
description: Comprehensive demand analysis and forecasting report

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: This section provides an overview of the demand analysis for {application_name}. The assessment evaluates current usage patterns, capacity requirements, and future demand projections to support strategic planning and resource allocation decisions.

sections.title: Current Demand Analysis
sections.content: The current demand for {application_name} is characterized by {context_information}. Analysis of usage patterns indicates {capabilities} with primary utilization within the {application_area} domain.

sections.title: Capacity Assessment
sections.content: Current system capacity supports {application_tier} tier operations with {license_utilization}. The application handles core business processes for {organization_name} with integration points including {dependencies}.

sections.title: Usage Patterns
sections.content: User engagement patterns for {application_name} demonstrate consistent utilization across {application_category} functions. Peak usage occurs during standard business operations with system performance maintained within acceptable parameters.

sections.title: Future Demand Projections
sections.content: Based on current trends and business growth projections, demand for {application_name} is expected to evolve in alignment with organizational objectives. Capacity planning should consider {recommendations} to support anticipated growth.

sections.title: Resource Requirements
sections.content: Supporting {application_name} requires ongoing investment in licensing ({license_info}), infrastructure, and maintenance. Total cost considerations include {tco} with operational expenses of {opex} managed by {vendor}.

sections.title: Risk Assessment
sections.content: Demand-related risks for {application_name} include capacity constraints, license limitations, and integration dependencies. Mitigation strategies should address {integration_points} and ensure adequate resource allocation.

sections.title: Recommendations
sections.content: Strategic recommendations for managing demand include optimizing license utilization, monitoring capacity trends, and maintaining integration architecture. {recommendations} should be implemented to support sustainable growth and operational efficiency.
